body:
Comment 4: 
Ouch!

To make it clear, the panic can be recovered later; and the program will continue with
corrupted heap, right?

Frankly, I did not though that running these programs will yield any results. Turns out
running nonsense is useful :)

If we make sigpanic non-preemptable all the way down, do we still need any additional
pcdata?

> Separately, it would be nice to know that the pcdata is wrong.

Won't it increase binary size significantly?
